channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Login Box
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Login Box

item.title: CVE-2023-0544|2024-08-02T05:17:49.363Z -- unknown -- wp%20login%20box
item.description: The WP Login Box WordPress plugin through 2.0.2 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
